visual_assets.name: clogged blood vessel
visual_assets.purpose: Illustrates severe hypertriglyceridemia with excess fat molecules
visual_assets.prompt: simple flat cartoon of a blood vessel crowded with many small, round yellow fat molecules, like traffic jam

visual_assets.name: inflamed pancreas
visual_assets.purpose: Represents acute pancreatitis as a complication
visual_assets.prompt: simple flat cartoon icon of an inflamed pancreas, red and slightly swollen, jagged edges

visual_assets.name: LPL enzyme worker
visual_assets.purpose: Represents the LPL enzyme breaking down fats
visual_assets.prompt: simple flat cartoon icon of a blue enzyme 'worker' character actively breaking down small yellow fat circles

visual_assets.name: ANGPTL3 brake molecule
visual_assets.prompt: simple flat cartoon icon of a red 'brake' symbol or a hand pushing down, slowing movement

visual_assets.name: fat molecule
visual_assets.purpose: Represents triglycerides as targets for LPL
visual_assets.prompt: simple flat cartoon icon of a small, round yellow fat molecule

visual_assets.name: evinacumab medicine molecule
visual_assets.prompt: simple flat cartoon icon of a blue medicine molecule, shaped like a key or block, interacting with the 'brake'

visual_assets.name: healthy person
visual_assets.purpose: Represents improved patient health and well-being
visual_assets.prompt: flat cartoon of a smiling, active person, simple outline, minimal detail, light colors

visual_assets.name: clear blood vessel
visual_assets.purpose: Symbolizes improved cardiovascular health and reduced triglyceride levels
visual_assets.prompt: simple flat cartoon of a clear, smooth blood vessel, blue and red outlines, no blockages

visual_assets.name: calm pancreas
visual_assets.prompt: simple flat cartoon icon of a healthy, calm pancreas, light green color, smooth edges

visual_assets.name: upward trend graph
visual_assets.purpose: Symbolizes positive progress towards better health or reduced risk
visual_assets.prompt: simple flat cartoon graph with a gentle upward trend line and an upward arrow, light green colors
